item.title: Prayer AB00094WEA in English
item.description: ##Revealed to the Bahá’ís of the United States and Canada *Let whosoever travels to different parts to teach, peruse over mountain, desert, land and sea this supplication. O God! O God! Thou seest my weakness, lowliness and humility before Thy creatures; nevertheless, I have trusted in Thee and have arisen in the promotion of Thy teachings among Thy strong servants, relying on Thy power and might. O Lord! I am a broken-winged bird and desire to soar in Thy limitless space.
